name: Hero's Quest: So You Want to Be a Hero
name_original: Hero's Quest: So You Want to Be a Hero
description:
Hero's Quest: So You Want to Be a Hero is an adventure game developed by Sierra On-Line. It came out on 01-01-1989. Sierra On-Line published the game.
Hero's Quest: So You Want to Be a Hero is available on PC.
Guruka Singh Khalsa, Guruka Singh-Khalsa, Ken Williams and Mark Seibert produced the game. It was directed by Mark Seibert. Mark Seibert scored the game.
